import React from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { UserLogged } from '../Store/UserContextStore' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet' import { useState } from 'react' export default function Register() { let navigate = useNavigate() let user = useContext(UserLogged) const [Checked,isChecked]=useState(false) function setUser(e){ e.preventDefault() user.setName(document.getElementById('name').value) user.setPassword(document.getElementById('password').value) navigate('/Signin',{replace:true}) } return ( <> Register

Register

{setUser(e)}}> {navigate('/Signin')}} style={{cursor:'pointer'}}>Already have an account?
) }
